title: Of what is a Gudoudama made of? - Quora

response.answer_text: Guduodama, otherwise known as Truth-Seeking Balls, are orbs made of black chakra which can alter their form and characteristics in various ways.  Those who awaken Six Paths Senjutsu can wield Truth-Seeking Balls. Hagoromo and Hamura Ōtsutsuki appear to have possessed this power naturally, whereas others may obtain it by becoming the jinchūriki of the Ten-Tails, or by receiving it directly from Hagoromo. Truth-Seeking Balls can be controlled individually or combined; in both cases, by understanding the power of "all things in nature" (森羅万象, Shinra Banshō), the orbs can be shaped into a variety of forms. The orbs can also wrap around the user's body to form a protective shell.  Or can become a Truth-Seeking Umbrella (求道傘, Gudōkasa). The Truth-Seeking Balls are also transformed into weapons by several of their users, such as:  Obito’s shakujō  Madara's shakujō  The Sword of Nunoboko  Naruto's Bō  Black Recievers.
